parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.66</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Arrays </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>Returns the array element with [[min]]imum numerical value. Engine solution to [[BIS_fnc_lowestNum]] and [[BIS_fnc_findExtreme]]. Therefore it is expected that supplied array consists of [[Number]]s only.  [[Boolean]]s however are also supported and will be evaluated as [[Number]]s: [[true]] - 1, [[false]] - 0. [[nil]] value treated as 0. 
<template lineStart="1"><title>Warning </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Other non [[Number]] elements (not recommended) will be evaluated as 0 and '''Bad conversion: scalar''' message will be logged into .[[rpt]].</value></part></template></value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value>'''selectMin''' array </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> array: [[Array]] - array of [[Number]]s </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Anything]] - element with [[min]]imum numerical value </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_min = [[selectMin]] [1,2,3,4,5]; //1</code>  </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>// Same as, for example: 
_min = _a [[min]] _b [[min]] _c [[min]] _d;
// Only faster:
_min = [[selectMin]] [_a,_b,_c,_d];</code>  </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[selectMax]], [[min]], [[max]], [[selectRandom]], [[select]], [[selectRandomWeighted]]</value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
